title: Ticket #3925: condor_master stops sending update ads
description:
At ligo, we see one master only send a daemon update ad once a day, despite

MASTER_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 300

And thus it is falling out of the collector.
remarks:
2013-Sep-17 16:09:09 by gthain:
can you turn on MASTER_DEBUG = <whatever it was before> D_DAEMONCORE

2013-Sep-17 16:36:03 by pfc:
Done.

I also then issued a condor_reconfig -all and manually kill -HUP'd the condor_master on sugar-dev3 since because of the problem at hand, it would not have otherwise received the reconfig. (And I suppose there may be other orphaned masters that also require a manual reconfig, but I don't know how I would find them...)

2015-Jan-12 10:22:45 by gthain:
If there's no update on this, I'm going to resolve it. Did we ever get the MasterLogs from the afflicted machines?

2015-Jan-12 13:29:14 by pfc:
Wait, were you unable to reproduce this? (Or otherwise waiting for me to send logs?) I'd like this not to be marked as resolved. (Abandoned maybe, if you don't care, but not resolved. I'm pretty sure I wasn't imagining things.)

2015-Jan-12 13:33:33 by pfc:
Never mind; I hadn't remembered that this, while quite real, was only happening on one machine. I'm willing to chalk it up to sunspots unless/until I see it again. Leave it resolved.
